definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Germanic origin, derived from the elements 'adal' (noble) and 'wine' (friend), meaning 'noble friend'. Commonly used in English-speaking countries as a personal name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自日耳曼语的男性名字，由 'adal'（高贵）和 'wine'（朋友）组成，意为‘高贵的朋友’。在英语国家中常作为人名使用。
definitions.example_en: Alvin was the lead singer of the famous 1950s group The Chipmunks.
definitions.example_cn: 阿尔文是20世纪50年代著名乐队《花栗鼠》的主唱。
